overview:
Eric leads Global Talent Acquisition for the world’s leading Commerce Cloud…Ariba (the world’s largest B2B Commerce Network). Ariba, an SAP Company, headquartered in Sunnyvale, CA, has offices in Bangalore, Prague, Paris, Alpharetta, Pittsburgh, Rio de Janeiro, Santiago, Lima, and Melbourne.

He is also the Co-Founder and Trustee of nonprofit, Lean Communities, and has 20 years of talent acquisition, talent management, process transformation, executive coaching, and outsourcing experience.

Eric established two Human Capital consulting and search firms and has led talent strategies for a strategy and process consulting firm. He has built the teams for Fortune 500 companies, private equity & venture capital-backed organizations (including start-ups).
